question: In which country, "Tombs of the Kings (Paphos)", a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is located?
explanation: Tombs of the Kings of Paphos, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is located in Cyprus. This large necropolis, dating back to the 4th century B.C., are carved out of solid rock with Doric columns and frescoed walls. These were the burial sites of aristocrats and high officers of Paphos, Cyprus.
